name: A Night Alone
alt: Naomi sitting on the couch, a beer in hand and a morose look on her face.
description: Sometimes Naomi doesn't want to spend the night alone.

name: Ayleid Ruin
alt: Naomi sitting on an Ayleid well, a flirty look on her face.
description: When on an adventure, Naomi is always on the lookout for a great photo opportunity.

name: Baking Catastrophe
alt: Naomi sitting down, a mixing bowl in hand, covered in chocolate.
description: She tries to bake with love, but it doesn't always go well.

name: Overlooking the City
alt: Naomi leaning on a balcony, a city skyline in the background.
description: The view is nice, but she'd rather look at you.

name: Ballet Stretches
alt: Naomi leaning on a ballet bar, stretching her leg up in the air.
description: It's important to do your stretches before you start dancing.

name: Ban Sign
alt: Naomi holding a picket sign that says 'Ban'.
description: She doesn't tolerate any unkindness in her communities.

name: Bartender
alt: Naomi standing behind a bar mixing a drink.
description: With how much she drinks, she can make a mean cocktail.

name: Barista
alt: Naomi standing in a coffee shop, cup in hand ready to take an order.
description: She thinks she can make a good latte, but she only drinks black coffee...

name: Sandy Day
alt: Naomi laying sideways on the beach.
description: She clearly isn't worried about getting sand in her hair.

name: Posing at the Beach
alt: Naomi on her stomach, laying on a beach towel, her legs in the air.
description: Naomi loves to strike a pose when the opportunity arises.

name: Beach Cutie
alt: Naomi sitting on a beach chair, bending a leg and resting her head on her knee.
description: She was feeling cute on this beautiful day.

name: Beach from Behind
alt: Naomi laying on her stomach, legs in the air, looking over her shoulder back at the screen.
description: She thinks she looks cute from any angle.

name: Getting Warm
alt: Naomi laying on her back on a beach towel, starting to sweat.
description: After spending all day at the beach, Naomi was starting to feel the heat.

name: Popsicles
alt: Naomi laying in a beach chair eating a popsicle
description: The best time for a frozen treat is when you're at the beach.

name: Beatsaber
alt: Naomi playing Beatsaber.
description: She doesn't own a VR set, but has always wanted to try this game.

name: Flirty and Playful
alt: Naomi on her hands and knees in bed, looking back over her shoulder with her tongue stuck out.
description: She loves to tease people and flirt, even if nothing comes of it.

name: Feeling Lovey
alt: Naomi on her stomach in bed, surrounded by hearts.
description: She took this to use as her avatar for a while.

name: Pillow Talk
alt: Naomi laying on her side in bed, resting her head on her hand
description: Time to chat about your day before calling it a night.

name: Interrupted
alt: Naomi caught by surprise while reading in bed.
description: She just wanted to read for a bit. She was not planning on being interrupted.

name: Restless
alt: Naomi sitting in bed, hugging her knee with her other leg stretched.
description: Sometimes Naomi struggles to unwind before bed, and would rather spend some time chatting.

name: Chatting in Bed
alt: Naomi laying on her stomach, smiling and chatting.
description: She will talk with you until she passes out.

name: Trouble Sleeping
alt: Naomi in her sheer nightgown, laying on her back in bed.
description: Sometimes she has to lay there for a bit before she can drift off.

name: Sleepover
alt: Naomi kneeling on the bed.
description: Got any ideas for a fun sleepover game?

name: Bedtime Cutie
alt: Naomi on her stomach in bed, legs in the air.
description: Even at bedtime, she feels cute sometimes.

name: Evening Stretch
alt: Naomi yawning and stretching in bed.
description: A good yawn and stretch before bed feels great.

name: Shy Sleeper
alt: Naomi with a shy look, stretching her legs toward the screen.
description: She gets shy when she is getting ready for bed.

name: Strike a Pose
alt: Naomi striking a cute pose and smiling, sitting on her bed.
description: She enjoys posing on the bed for a cute picture.

name: Covering Up
alt: Naomi sitting on the bed, wrapping her arms around her chest.
description: She needs to change into her nightgown, and doesn't want to be watched.

name: Laying Down
alt: Naomi in a sundress, laying on the bed.
description: She just wanted to lay down for a moment. It's been a busy day.

name: Caught Before Bed
alt: Naomi on her hands and knees, getting ready for bed.
description: You caught her just before she crawled into bed.

name: Blushing Beauty
alt: Naomi blushing bright red, hands on her cheeks.
description: Whatever happened has got her all sorts of flustered.

name: Hunting for a Book
alt: Naomi leaning over, looking through a bookshelf.
description: Choosing your next book can be a challenge, especially if the last book was really good.

name: Crawling Out
alt: Naomi crawling out of a box.
description: She can be very cat-like, sometimes.

name: Hide and Seek
alt: Naomi peeking out of a box.
description: She loves to play hide and seek. She's a very good hider.

name: Break Time
alt: Naomi leaning back in her chair, her feet on the desk.
description: Sometimes she needs a break from staring at the screen.

name: Reaching for the Butterfly
alt: Naomi in a red field, reaching up toward a green butterfly.
description: Beauty is fleeting, but she still wants that butterfly.

name: Coffee Time
alt: Naomi sitting in a cafe outside, sipping on coffee.
description: She enjoys her coffee, and getting out of the house is a nice bonus.

name: Camping Out
alt: Naomi sitting at a campfire.
description: Spending a night in the woods is nice, but more than a couple of days and she misses her home.

name: Queen of Hearts
alt: Naomi appearing as the queen on a standard queen of hearts card.
description: Can she be the queen of your heart?

name: Poker Night
alt: Naomi laying on a casino table, holding a card.
description: Pretty sure this isn't how the game is played.

name: Kitty Cat
alt: Naomi wearing a tail and posing like a cat.
description: Mew mew

name: Social Club
alt: Naomi sitting in a chair next to a table of mimosas.
description: She comes for the socialising but stays for the drinks.

name: Feeling Smug
alt: Naomi sitting in a chair, looking smug.
description: It may not be an actual throne, but it is her throne.

name: Cheering You On
alt: Naomi cheering, pom poms in each hand.
description: She believes in you, so now you should believe in yourself.

name: Checkmate
alt: Naomi sitting at a table, chess board ready for a new game.
description: She loves to play chess. Wanna try your hand against her?

name: Vampire of Roses
alt: Naomi laying in a coffin full of roses, vines wrapping her arms and legs.
description: She may not be a vampire, but she thinks her elegance surpasses one.

name: Too Much Studying
alt: Naomi laying down, confused, surrounded by books.
description: Sometimes she tries to learn too much at once and it all jumbles together.

name: Master Chef
alt: Naomi in the kitchen, cooking a stew.
description: Naomi really shouldn't be allowed in the kitchen...

name: Evening Glow
alt: Naomi sitting down, the sunset hitting her face.
description: In the right light, she seems to positively glow.

name: Cyberspace
alt: Naomi crouching down in a cybernetic looking world.
description: They say she's a hacker, but she couldn't hack her way out of a paper bag.

name: Lunch Date
alt: Naomi at a restaurant table outside, a sandwich in front of her.
description: Would you take her out to lunch?

name: Ultimate Debugging
alt: Naomi smashing a computer with an oversized hammer.
description: When the bugs in the code become too much...

name: Chill Developer
alt: Naomi at her desk, leaning back in her chair as she works.
description: When things are going really well, Naomi feels like a pro.

name: Steak Dinner
alt: Naomi at a table with a steak dinner in front of her, making the peace sign.
description: The smoke totally isn't from the six she burned in the process...

name: Time for a Drink
alt: Naomi resting her head on the counter, glass and bottle in hand.
description: When you can't fix your problems, drink them away.

name: Road Trip
alt: Naomi in the car, driving.
description: She does love to drive. Sometimes a little too fast.

name: World in My Hands
alt: Naomi leaning on the planet Earth, the stars behind her.
description: There are days where she feels like the world is her oyster, and nothing can stop her.

name: Evening Decompression
alt: Naomi laying on the couch, scrolling through her phone.
description: After a hard day, sometimes she mindlessly zones out on Discord.

name: Work Until You Drop
alt: Naomi sitting at her desk, sleeping on her laptop.
description: She's totally fallen asleep at her desk before.

name: Atop a Fence
alt: Naomi sitting on top of a chainlink fence.
description: She loves climbing things so she can look down at the view.

name: Field of Flowers
alt: Naomi dancing in a field of white flowers.
description: Naomi loves to get out and play in nature.

name: Fight Me
alt: Naomi with her fists raised, ready to fight.
description: This is a bad idea, she probably won't win.

name: Night by the Fire
alt: Naomi sitting in her nightgown in front of a fireplace.
description: Nothing beats the fireplace on a cold winter night.

name: Backflip
alt: Naomi doing a backflip over a bar.
description: She can be athletic when she wants to be.

name: Flirty Time
alt: Naomi laying on the floor by her bed, giving a flirty look.
description: There are times where she really can't help herself.

name: Floating in the Sea
alt: Naomi in the water by the beach, floating on an inflatable ring.
description: Tempting to let the waves take her away.

name: Sitting on the Floor
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor, eating a snack.
description: It can be nice to just sit down and relax.

name: Floral Spirits
alt: Naomi sitting on her bed, surrounded by flowers and spirits.
description: Called by her kindness, the spirits came to pay her a visit.

name: Forest Shade
alt: Naomi sitting under a tree, in the shade.
description: On a hot day, finding the shade of a tree to read under is the best.

name: Frustrating Code
alt: Naomi at her computer, looking frustrated.
description: Once again, she cannot find the bug. She wrote it.

name: Focused Gamer
alt: Naomi laying in bed, surrounded by snacks, playing a game on her laptop.
description: She has all sorts of gaming choices, but likes the ones where she can stay in bed.

name: Console Gaming
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor, playing on her XBox
description: RPGs are her favourite, and character customisation is a huge selling point.

name: The Witcher
alt: Naomi sitting in bed, playing The Witcher 3
description: She doesn't mind the lack of character customisation - she's got a thing for Geralt anyway.

name: Koikatsu on Switch
alt: Naomi laying in bed, playing Koikatsu on her Switch.
description: Talk about the ultimate character creation...

name: Gaming in Bed
alt: Naomi laying in bed, playing a game on her console.
description: On a day off, Naomi might not ever get out of bed. If the game is fun.

name: Gasping in Surprise
alt: Naomi gasping in surprise, hand covering her mouth.
description: Whatever happened, she certainly wasn't expecting it.

name: Laying in the Field
alt: Naomi laying down in a field of grass.
description: Cloud watching is loads of fun. She can always find a cool shape.

name: Sniper
alt: Naomi holding a sniper rifle, looking through the scope.
description: Taking her foes out from a distance keeps her safe and hidden.

name: Warmup Stretch
alt: Naomi sitting on her knees, leaning back to stretch her thighs.
description: Doing floor stretches before she starts her exercise routine.

name: Ready to Vault
alt: Naomi leaning on a piece of gym equipment, ready to jump over it.
description: First she checks if her form is correct, before she jumps over it.

name: Working Out or Playing Out?
alt: Naomi in her gym clothes, sitting on a piece of equipment and sticking her tongue out.
description: She actually doesn't know what this is, or how to use it.

name: Hammock at the Beach
alt: Naomi laying on a white hammock, hand behind her head.
description: If the water wasn't so close, she'd do her work out here.

name: Shining Heart
alt: Naomi making a heart with her hands, sparkles and glitter behind her.
description: When she truly feels loved, it shows.

name: Hearts for Valentines
alt: Naomi making a heart with her hands, a pink and maroon checkerboard behind her.
description: This was the image for her valentine's card.

name: Leaping Love
alt: Naomi doing a little jump and wave, a heart behind her.
description: The love can overwhelm her sometimes, and she can barely contain it.

name: Reluctant Love
alt: Naomi making a heart with her hands, a reluctant look on her face.
description: It might not be what she wants to do, but she gives you her love.

name: Broken Heart
alt: Naomi kneeling down with her head down, the text Heartbroken behind her.
description: Not everything goes well for her.

name: Soak in the Spring
alt: Naomi sitting on the edge of a hot spring, reaching her hand out to invite you.
description: Join her? She's inviting you.

name: Spa Day
alt: Naomi sitting on the edge of a hot spring, her legs in the water.
description: Soaking her legs allows her to relax without getting her hair wet.

name: Hugging Time!
alt: Naomi reaching her arms out to offer a hug.
description: Do you want a hug?

name: Idol Star
alt: Naomi on a vibrant stage, singing her heart out.
description: There's no way she would ever be an idol with the way she sings, but she likes to pretend.

name: Insomnia
alt: Naomi in bed, looking upset as she struggles to sleep.
description: Yet another sleepless night...

name: Behind Bars
alt: Naomi standing in a locked prison cell.
description: What did she do? Who knows.

name: Kitchen Company
alt: Naomi sitting on the counter in the kitchen.
description: She may be useless in the kitchen, but she'll keep you company while you cook!

name: Pet the Kitty
alt: Naomi crouching down, smiling at a cat.
description: Definitely more of a cat person than a dog person.

name: Lazy Day
alt: Naomi laying on the couch, eating snacks.
description: One of those days where she has no motivation for anything.

name: Library Trip
alt: Naomi laying on the floor of a library, surrounded by books.
description: She can, and will, spend hours in the library. They've had to kick her out at closing time before.

name: Lounging Around
alt: Naomi sitting on the couch, surrounded by snacks and electronics, watching a video on her phone.
description: A bit of a couch potato today, but it is a well earned day off.

name: Lunch Break
alt: Naomi sitting in a chair, holding a box of pocky.
description: Want to share my pocky?

name: Summoning Circle
alt: Naomi sitting on her bed, admiring the summoning circle she drew.
description: But what is she trying to summon?

name: Summoned Naomi
alt: Naomi standing in the summoning circle she just appeared in.
description: Who summoned her? And more importantly, why?

name: Magic Attack
alt: Naomi casting a red magic spell.
description: She's normally a sword user, but has a couple of magical talents.

name: Good Morning
alt: Naomi in bed, slowly waking up.
description: Not at all a morning girl, Naomi is slow to wake up.

name: Motorbike Ride
alt: Naomi riding a motorcycle, wielding a katana.
description: She feels like a superhero. Someone should tell her riding with a sword is dangerous.

name: Movie Theatre
alt: Naomi sitting at the movies, looking over at you.
description: Movie theatres make a great date spot.

name: Music Lover
alt: Naomi sitting in a chair with her legs on the table, listening to music.
description: Music is one of her passions - she's always listening to something.

name: Headphones Sharing
alt: Naomi sharing her headphones with you.
description: She has a song she wants you to listen to.

name: Purple Nails
alt: Naomi's pointed purple fingernails and toenails.
description: Her nails are always done up.

name: Self Care
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor trimmming her toenails.
description: A lot of work goes in to looking this good.

name: Classroom Nap
alt: Naomi sleeping at a classroom desk.
description: Apparently the lecture wasn't all that interesting.

name: Sleeping at her Desk
alt: Naomi sleeping at her desk.
description: When she overworks herself, she ends up sleeping in strange places.

name: Out in Nature
alt: Naomi sitting under the shade of a tree.
description: She could sit outside for hours, as long as there's shade.

name: Burnout
alt: Naomi sitting at her computer crying.
description: The code can be incredibly frustrating sometimes...

name: Bench in the Park
alt: Naomi stting on a bench in the park.
description: She loves watching the sun set.

name: Peace and Love
alt: Naomi giving a peace sign with her fingers.
description: She hopes you have a blessed day.

name: Peek-A-Boo
alt: Naomi peeking from around a door.
description: She wonders if she should have knocked first...

name: Piano Woman
alt: Naomi sitting at a grand piano.
description: While it's been years since she played, she still loves it.

name: Snuggling a Pillow
alt: Naomi sitting on a blanket, snuggling a pillow.
description: She normally carries around a plushie, but a pillow works in a pinch.

name: Rough Night
alt: Naomi sitting on her bed hugging a pillow.
description: Bad dreams make for very rough nights.

name: Bunny Plushie
alt: Naomi snuggling a bunny plushie.
description: It's actually rare to see Naomi without one of her plushies in hand.

name: Her Favourite Plushie
alt: Naomi laying in bed snuggling a stuffed bunny.
description: Everyone has a favourite plushie. Naomi's is actually a Miku plushie.

name: I Choose You
alt: Naomi pointing at the screen.
description: But what does she choose you for??

name: Midnight Swim
alt: Naomi standing in a pool under the moonlight.
description: Sneaking out for a dip in the night is exhilarating and relaxing, all at once.

name: Rainy Day
alt: Naomi crouched under an umbrella, keeping a cat dry.
description: Naomi is always kind to animals.

name: DJ Naomi
alt: Naomi standing at a large DJ station.
description: She's really bad at this.

name: Found a Book
alt: Naomi carrying a book from the bookshelf in a library.
description: Picking just one book feels impossible. Naomi wants them all.

name: A Book Outside
alt: Naomi sitting under a tree reading a book.
description: While everyone else plays, she enjoys her solitude with a book.

name: Relaxing Afternoon
alt: Naomi laying on the couch reading a book.
description: Reading is one of her biggest hobbies. It's nice to get away from the electronics.

name: Waiting for the Compiler
alt: Naomi sitting at her desk, putting her feet up and reading a book.
description: She has to kill the time while she waits for her code to build.

name: Lost in the Story
alt: Naomi laying on her stomach reading a book in bed.
description: Before she knows it, it's 2AM.

name: Poolside Reading
alt: Naomi in the pool, reading a book.
description: Be careful not to get the pages wet!

name: Reading in Bed
alt: Naomi laying in bed reading a book.
description: Reading before bed helps her unwind and prepare for sleep.

name: Time to Chill
alt: Naomi laying on her stomach, smiling.
description: Sitting down and doing nothing is quite relaxing at times.

name: Long Day of Work
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor, her laptop case next to her.
description: After a long day at the office, sometimes the couch feels too far away and the floor too tempting.

name: Traditional Restaurant
alt: Naomi sitting on the floor of a traditional looking restaurant.
description: Sushi and noodles are her favourites.

name: Ritual Gone Wrong
alt: Naomi passed out in a magic circle.
description: When she was asked to participate in a ritual, this was not what she envisioned.

name: Float Down the River
alt: Naomi floating on a raft in the river.
description: Being in the water at night is both scary and thrilling.

name: Blue Emotions
alt: Naomi sitting on the bed, hugging a pillow and looking sad.
description: Pretending that every day is great only hides the pain.

name: Sakura Trees
alt: Naomi dancing under a bunch of sakura trees.
description: She absolutely loves the cherry blossom trees.

name: Keep a Secret
alt: Naomi standing in the hallway, putting her finger to her lips.
description: I wonder what the surprise is...

name: Sing To Me
alt: Naomi standing with a hand on her hip, holding a microphone and singing
description: Private karaoke rooms are the best.

name: I Fits, I Sits
alt: Naomi sitting in a box full of packing material.
description: She's like a cat, truly.

name: Sitting Pretty
alt: Naomi in her nightgown, sitting on a blanket.
description: She's ready to sit and chat.

name: Dark Ritual
alt: Naomi sitting in front of some skulls, beckoning you closer.
description: This looks creepy. You should probably back away.

name: Falling Through the Sky
alt: Naomi falling through the sky, the sun behind her.
description: Dreams like this typically don't end well.

name: Fell Asleep Reading
alt: Naomi sleeping on her bed, several books next to her.
description: She does this a lot.

name: Curled Up
alt: Naomi sleeping on her bed, curled up.
description: Sometimes she's too exhausted to even change in to her nightgown.

name: Finally Asleep
alt: Naomi sleeping on her floor bed.
description: When she finally passes out, she sleeps hard.

name: Snack Time
alt: Naomi walking down the street, snacking on a cookie.
description: Can't even wait to get home before digging into the goodies.

name: Bath Time
alt: Naomi soaking in the bathtub, having a drink.
description: Letting the water relax her feels so good.

name: Carbonation Disaster
alt: Naomi holding an open soda bottle that is exploding with bubbles.
description: Who shook this?!

name: Stress Relief
alt: Naomi soaking in a tub with flowers on the water.
description: Relaxing in the tub and enjoying the aromatherapy.

name: Spacing Out
alt: Naomi staring at the computer screen with a blank look on her face.
description: Staring at the screen too long and she loses focus.

name: Doing the Splits
alt: Naomi on the floor, doing a forward split, holding her phone.
description: She was so proud of this moment, she had to capture a picture.

name: Character Stats
alt: Naomi next to some RPG style character stats.
description: Is she stronger than you?

name: Trying the Splits
alt: Naomi reaching for her foot as she tries a horizontal split.
description: She's almost there. So close!

name: Cammy Stretch
alt: Naomi leaning forward, arching her back, and reaching up.
description: She heard this was a meme and wanted in on it.

name: Studying Hard
alt: Naomi sitting at a desk taking notes.
description: Seems like she's distracted by you, though.

name: Naomi Appears
alt: Naomi sitting in a summoning circle, surrounded by roses.
description: Roses were a nice touch, and definitely helped motivate her to show up.

name: Basking in the Sun
alt: Naomi laying on her bed, the sun shining on her.
description: Sunlight makes her skin look radiant.

name: Surprised
alt: Naomi giving a surprised look
description: She's so happy to see you, but it was unexpected.

name: Swim Training
alt: Naomi at the edge of the pool, looking at you.
description: Did she beat her latest lap record?

name: Swing Set
alt: Naomi sitting on a swing at the park.
description: Being up high gives her a rush.

name: Sword Dancer
alt: Naomi drawing a katana from its scabbard.
description: Practising her sword skills is a daily routine.

name: Tank Commander
alt: Naomi sitting in a tank, giving the order to advance.
description: Who on earth let her have a tank?!

name: Tavern Talk
alt: Naomi sitting at the bar, a mug of beer and some food in front of her.
description: Visiting the local tavern is a great place to trade stories.

name: Tea for One
alt: Naomi sitting outside a teahouse, holding a fan with a cup of tea next to her.
description: Coffee is great for the morning, but tea is perfect for the afternoon.

name: Hail to the Queen
alt: Naomi sitting in a throne, giving a smug look.
description: Maybe she isn't royalty, but she demands your worship and fealty all the same.

name: Shelter from the Rain
alt: Naomi sitting on a park bench holding an umbrella.
description: The weather got a bit too rainy, so she decided to sit and wait it out.

name: Under the Sea
alt: Naomi floating underwater, giving a salute.
description: She can hold her breath for a remarkably long time.

name: Valentines Day
alt: Naomi sitting on the bed, surrounded by rose petals.
description: She loves valentines day. It's a great excuse to be romantic.

name: Walk in the Park
alt: Naomi going for a stroll in the park.
description: Getting out and enjoying the sunshine is one of her best weekend activities.

name: Spiked my Drink
alt: Naomi sitting with a glass in hand, surprised at the contents.
description: This isn't water... what is this??

name: Sunny Day
alt: Naomi sitting on a bench by the window, enjoying the day.
description: On days like this, Naomi sits as close to the window as possible if she can't be outside.

name: Cabin Window
alt: Naomi sitting in the window of a log cabin.
description: Big windows like this are ideal, so she can throw them open and enjoy the fresh air.

name: Enjoying the View
alt: Naomi in her nightgown, sitting in the window sill.
description: Is the view out the window? Or is the view Naomi?

name: A Wink and a Kiss
alt: Naomi winking at the camera, making a peace sign with her fingers.
description: Fun and flirty, but she's rarely serious about it.

name: Hard at Work
alt: Naomi at her desk, focused on her laptop.
description: When she gets in the groove, time flies by and no one can distract her.

name: Boring Tasks
alt: Naomi slouching in her chair, looking at her computer unamused.
description: Not every task at work is entertaining. Sometimes she has to push through the boring stuff.

name: Distracted
alt: Naomi sitting at her computer, looking at you with a distracted stare.
description: Unused to interruptions, talking to her while she's working is a great way to get her attention.

name: Proud of her Work
alt: Naomi at her computer, looking back over her shoulder and smiling.
description: Naomi loves to show off her projects when she's done - especially if it was a difficult one.

name: Cafe Work
alt: Naomi sitting at a cafe table, working on her laptop.
description: She doesn't go to the cafe just to work, she goes for the coffee. And brings work with her.

name: Gonna Swim?
alt: Naomi standing at the edge of the swimming pool, looking back over her shoulder and smiling.
description: She wants to know if you're getting in the pool with her.

name: Take a Shot
alt: Naomi firing an arrow from a bow.
description: She rarely misses her mark.

name: Morning Breeze
alt: Naomi standing in the balcony of a sliding glass door.
description: Her ideal way to start the morning is with a nice breeze as she soaks up the sun.

name: Aftermath
alt: Naomi kneeling on the floor, surrounded by blood, grinning.
description: Someone chose to pick a fight with her, and suffered the consequences.

name: Kitchen Prep
alt: Naomi standing at the counter, chopping a cabbage.
description: She may not be a good cook, but she is always happy to help with the prep work!

name: Dance Dance Dance
alt: Naomi on a stage dancing.
description: Naomi loves to get down to a good tune.

name: Bad Idea
alt: Naomi with her arms extended, an evil grin on her face and a red shine in her eyes.
description: She's got an idea. It's probably a bad idea. Whatever she offers, you don't want to get involved.

name: Documentary
alt: Naomi laying in bed, hugging a pillow, viewed from a currently recording camera.
description: Asked to star in a documentary seemed like a good idea, but she really didn't want to get out of bed.

name: Firework Festival
alt: Naomi holding a caramel apple and cotton candy, fireworks exploding behind her.
description: Fireworks are one of her favourite things, and going to a festival with yummy food to see them makes it even better.

name: Heat Wave
alt: Naomi sitting in front of a fan, eating a popsicle.
description: Hot weather is the absolute worst. She always struggles to stay cool.

name: Late-night Swim
alt: Naomi sitting on a pier in the night, considering going for a swim.
description: It may be a cool night, but it's never too cold to dive in the water.

name: Scared Sleepless
alt: Naomi in bed, hiding under the blankets.
description: There is a monster under her bed. She knows it's there, no matter how many people say it isn't.

name: Careless Mistake
alt: Naomi with a stern look, pointing a finger in a scolding gesture.
description: Whatever you've done, she aims to ensure you never do it again.

name: Selfie
alt: Naomi snapping a selfie as she makes a peace sign.
description: Selfies are a lot of fun. She takes quite a few of them.

name: Paladin's Judgement
alt: Naomi looking down at the screen, pointing a glowing blue blade at it.
description: Thou art weighed in the balances, and art found wanting.

name: Swimming Laps
alt: Naomi in the pool, floating at the edge, looking back over her shoulder.
description: 'You timed me this time, right? Right??'

name: Watching a Show
alt: Naomi laying in bed, watching television.
description: If she doesn't feel like gaming, she'll lay in bed and watch an anime.

name: At The Falls
alt: Naomi standing in front of a waterfall, stretching.
description: Waterfalls are one of her favourite nature destinations.

name: Star Student
alt: Naomi sitting in a classroom chair, her feet on the desk, hiding her face with a hand.
description: As a student, Naomi coasted through most of school with little effort. She was always bored, and it showed.

name: Put On a Show
alt: Naomi in a dancer dress, swaying her arms.
description: Okay, so she isn't the best dancer. She still has fun with it.

name: Knight Naomi
alt: Naomi wearing a black and purple metal chest plate with a long skirt, wielding a sword.
description: Striking down her foes swiftly is what she specialises in.

name: Visiting the Temple
alt: Naomi in a black yukata with a purple sash, standing on a bridge over a pond in a traditional shrine.
description: Temples and shrines have always appealed to her with their serenity.

name: Shrine Maiden
alt: Naomi wearing a purple and black shrine maiden outfit, sitting on a bench in a shrine.
description: Without the proper training, welcoming you to the shrine is about all she can do.

name: Maid Cafe
alt: Naomi wearing a maid outfit, serving a platter of food and drinks.
description: Working in the maid cafe turned out to be fun, and a great way to meet new friends!

name: Miku Concert
alt: Naomi performing on a stage while wearing a Hatsune Miku outfit.
description: Really just a dream, but one day Naomi hopes to make it reality!

name: Naomi's Affection
alt: Naomi sitting down, holding out her hand and presenting a heart.
description: She gives you her affection.

name: Secret Confession
alt: Naomi standing on the sidewalk, extending a love letter to you, blushing.
description: If she confessed her love, what would you do?

name: Challenger Approaching
alt: Naomi in the 'Challenger Approaching' screen from Super Smash Brothers.
description: Ready for the fight?

name: Clockwork Tower
alt: Naomi sitting on the platform of a tower, gears rotating behind her.
description: Much like life, the gears stop for no one.

name: Leave it to God?
alt: Naomi holding a gun, the text 'We can't expect God to do all the work.' behind her.
description: Forget that. Naomi prefers to handle her own problems.

name: Bad Decisions
alt: Naomi with a wry smile, the text 'Today I am going to make BAD choices' behind her.
description: So... basically another regular day, then.
